mapper.select: SELECT m.ID , m.USER_ID , m.PASSWORD, m.NAME, g.TITLE AS GENDER , m.BIRTHDAY , m.EMAIL, a.DISTRICT AS ADDRESS, m.DETAIL_ADDR FROM "MEMBER" m LEFT OUTER JOIN ADDRESS a ON m.ADDRESS_ID = a.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN GENDER g ON m.GENDER_ID = g.ID WHERE m.USER_ID = #{userid} AND m.PASSWORD = #{password}
